ai-tika-s0403t9:1_0: yet hemaged in the first-proclaimed and the rest.
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_1: One should speak to them in the first place, and one should say:
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_2: For the third time, knowingly, each other is knowingly the path to purity, knowingly, sees people in each path.
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_3: But because of the fruit of that understanding of the path leading to the fruit of right understanding that in the way already stated, and it is said, “Here there is no profitable state” .
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_4: people declare enlightenment not two things.
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_5: Hence it is said: “Here a wise man, I have attained perfection.”
ai-tika-s0403t9:2_6: perceiving what was attained, they perceived, and attained what is not attained, and attained what has not been attained by me.
ai-tika-s0403t9:3_0: The first section for recitation on the meaning is finished.
ai-tika-s0403t9:4_0: The Book of the Friends is finished.
